generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Move Towards Home Restriction Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows entities with a "minecraft:home" component to move towards their home position. If "restriction_radius" is set, entities will be able to run this behavior only if outside of it.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: This multiplier modifies the entity's speed when moving towards its restriction.
